description: The goal of this project is to establish a qualified pool of suppliers to provide information technology staff augmentation services and IT project delivery services.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
===============

###  Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-8204-56421752
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: 2023-3941
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-11T14:00:00 (Closed)

This notice is a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for the provision of Information Technology (IT) Staff Augmentation Services and IT Project Delivery Services to Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC).

### Work Description

CDIC is seeking up to twenty qualified suppliers to provide IT staff augmentation services and an unlimited number of suppliers to provide IT project delivery services, under a three-year term.

There are two service streams:

* Service Stream #1: IT Staff Augmentation Services
* Service Stream #2: IT Project Delivery Services

### Requirements

The successful suppliers will be required to provide the following services on an as-and-when-needed basis:

* IT staff augmentation services for CDIC's IT operations
* IT project delivery services to support CDIC's strategic initiatives

### Selection Criteria

Variations or combinations of the following methods will be used to select the successful suppliers:

* Quality of proposed services
* Experience of the supplier's personnel
* Proposal pricing
* Compliance with the RFSA requirements

### Important Information

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Contracting Entity: Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC)
* Closing Date: 2023-10-11T14:00:00 (Closed)

### Contact Information

* Judy Ann Hollander
* Procurement@cdic.ca
* (343) 576-2218

Attachments:
\* [ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8204/cdic-rfsa-2023-3941_amended-appendix_c_2_reference_engagement_form.zip ]

This would include editing and rephrasing the original text to improve clarity and grammar. Here are some additional guidelines to enhance professionalism:

* Use standard font
